description: Today, the resurgence of interest in classic yachts can be witnessed at classic yacht regattas that occur annually all around the world. Bobrow and Jinkins have followed these regattas over a period of years and, in addition to their own photos and research, have solicited essays from regatta organizers, designers, and directors of boatyards that have specialized in classic boats. Filled with photographs and replete with information, this book is the most complete, up-to-date book on classic yachts ever produced.
